MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the TD2 and TD3 postcode area of Galashiels. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8PM to repair a fault on our overhead line network near to Blythe Farm and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:16PM on Sunday, 11 April 2021
